entries.title: Israelis protest government's judicial overhaul plans
entries.description: Opponents: Netanyahu’s proposed judicial overhauls threaten democratic values.

entries.title: Man held for California school fight, gun threat to students
entries.description: He allegedly punched three players during a girls’ high school basketball game.

entries.title: Tesla hikes price of Model Y after US alters tax credit rule
entries.description: The changes make more versions of the small SUV eligible for tax credits.

entries.title: Man given 16 years for shooting at kids throwing snowballs
entries.description: A group of children who threw snowballs at his car.

entries.title: Kansas police responding to overdose call shoot, kill man
entries.description: An armed man fled from the scene of an opioid overdose, police say.

entries.title: Train derails, goes up in flames, causes half of town to evacuate
entries.description: Local officials in East Palestine, Ohio, have ordered roughly 2,000 residents to evacuate their homes after a Norfolk Southern train derailed and caught fire.

entries.title: Teenage girl killed by shark while jet skiing in Australia
entries.description: Police in Western Australia say a teenage girl was killed in a suspected shark attack in Perth after she jumped from her jet ski

entries.title: 'Died suddenly' posts twist tragedies to push vaccine lies
entries.description: A growing online conspiracy theory is using the tagline “died suddenly” to baselessly claim that COVID-19 vaccines are killing people

entries.title: Why a new Alzheimer's drug is having a slow US debut
entries.description: The first drug to show that it slows Alzheimer’s is on sale, but treatment for most patients is still several months away

entries.title: Man rescued by Coast Guard wanted in 'Goonies' fish incident
entries.description: A man who was saved by a Coast Guard rescue swimmer at the mouth of the Columbia River on Friday was wanted by police for a bizarre fish dumping incident at the home featured in the classic film, “The Goonies.”

entries.title: Robb Elementary School to be demolished, Uvalde contends with conflicting emotions
entries.description: Robb Elementary School is to be demolished following the mass shooting.

entries.title: Royal Navy sailors hospitalized after drinking water on ship
entries.description: A Royal Navy warship has returned to port in Britain after several sailors got sick from the vessel’s drinking water

entries.title: Ohio train derailment causes causes fire, home evacuations
entries.description: A train has derailed in an Ohio town near the Pennsylvania border and caused a large fire followed by orders for area residents to evacuate their homes Friday night

entries.title: Famed LA mountain lion's death shines light on tribal talks
entries.description: Southern California's most popular puma gained fame as P-22 and cast a spotlight on the troubled population of California’s endangered mountain lions and their decreasing genetic diversity

entries.title: California won't require COVID vaccine to attend schools
entries.description: California won’t make children get the coronavirus vaccine to attend schools

entries.title: Biden makes progress on 'unity agenda' outlined in 2022
entries.description: A year ago, President Joe Biden used his first State of the Union address to push top Democratic priorities that were sure to face a battle in the narrowly divided Congress — tough asks like an assault weapons ban

entries.title: Florida schools directed to hide classroom books that are not vetted
entries.description: The state board of education said a law restricting school libraries from displaying or lending books that have not been vetted applies to books displayed in classrooms.

entries.title: Officers kill man in S. Carolina after he stabs police dog
entries.description: Officers in South Carolina have shot and killed a man who stabbed a police dog during a raid on a home

entries.title: Eye drops recalled after 55 reports of bacterial infection, 1 death in 12 states
entries.description: Ezricare and Delsam Pharma artificial tears eye drops have been recalled following reports of infections, vision loss and one death.

entries.title: Balloon incident adds new tension to US-China relationship
entries.description: The Chinese balloon incident came on the eve of a Beijing visit Secretary of State Blinken has now postponed, adding new tension to the U.S.-China relationship.

entries.title: Where the Chinese surveillance balloon has been spotted
entries.description: Sightings of a massive surveillance balloon believed to be from China have been popping up on social media as the object travels across the U.S.
